work.name: Cloud Hunter Solutions, Tijuana
work.summary: Collaborated with a diverse team to assist companies in establishing a strong online presence, specializing in the development of customized landing pages and professional SMTP setups tailored to each company's domain. Leveraged expertise in SMTP servers to effectively manage email communications, ensuring reliable delivery and inbox placement. Implemented Cloudflare to manage DNS settings and mitigate security threats, safeguarding websites against potential attacks and ensuring uninterrupted service. Worked closely with clients to understand their unique requirements, providing personalized solutions to enhance their brand visibility and customer engagement. Contributed to the growth of the team's portfolio by delivering high-quality web solutions, resulting in increased customer satisfaction and retention.

work.name: Katzkin, Tijuana
work.summary: I enjoyed helping users worldwide while working at an international company, where I was responsible for managing the ticketing system and overseeing the IT department. Managed Windows OS environments for global users, troubleshooting OS and software-related issues. Administered Active Directory, handling user accounts, group policies, and permissions. Supported Microsoft Exchange/M365 email configurations, ensuring secure and reliable communication. Diagnosed and resolved network issues, including TCP/IP, DNS, and DHCP configurations. Provided Tier 1 and Tier 2 support via the ticketing system, achieving a 95% first-call resolution rate. Developed a company-wide Quality System to improve product validation processes.

work.name: Electronic Recyclers International
work.summary: As a TV Dismantler & Sorter at ERI, I play a crucial role in the efficient processing and recycling of electronic waste, ensuring proper handling and sorting of materials in compliance with environmental and safety regulations. My responsibilities include disassembling televisions and other electronic devices, sorting materials such as metals, plastics, glass, circuit boards, batteries, and wood, and maintaining a clean and organized workspace.
